extension.name: QueryPath for Joomla
extension.author: Giboo
extension.description:
QueryPath for Joomla

You are familiar to DOM inspection with JQuery (or Mootools) ?
You can do the same in PHP, using QueryPath in your components and modules !
For more information, take a look at querypath.org. (all credits go there of course : I just built the Joomla Librairie Package)

Usage

jimport('querypath.QueryPath');
$qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB); // Generate a new QueryPath object.
$body = $qp->find('body'); // Find the body tag.

More tutorial Here : https://fedorahosted.org/querypath/wiki/QueryPathTutorial
